actions.text: Amendment SA 4660 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 66. Record Vote Number: 201.

Amendment SA 4660 proposed by Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S7478, S7483, S7484, S7485, S7487-7488; text: CR S7478; text as modified: CR S7485) To appropriate an additional $85,670,000 to enable the Secretary of Homeland Security to hire 800 additional full time active duty investigators to investigate immigration laws violations and to offset such increase on a pro rata basis.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4660 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 66. Record Vote Number: 201.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 4660 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 34 - 66. Record Vote Number: 201.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4660 proposed by Senator Sessions.

purpose: To appropriate an additional $85,670,000 to enable the Secretary of Homeland Security to hire 800 additional full time active duty investigators to investigate immigration laws violations and to offset such increase on a pro rata basis.
